verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- President Donald Trump [V: seemed] [ARG1: to float a new idea about border control during at a tax reform roundtable in Ohio] . The President was in the midst of criticizing Democrats during a riff about border security when he slipped in the idea that people might " have to think about closing up ...
